name: Project
description: Root node representing a single project

name: Participant
description: Any human involved with the project

name: Stakeholder
description: Stakeholder with responsibilities in the project

name: ScopeOfWork
description: Summary of what is in scope

name: Deliverable
description: A concrete output of the project

name: Task
description: A unit of work needed to realize deliverables

name: InputAsset
description: Existing data or artifacts used by the project

name: SuccessCriteria
description: Container for metrics SLOs and acceptance criteria

name: AcceptanceCriterion
description: Condition under which a deliverable is accepted

name: Risk
description: Risk item with likelihood and impact

name: Assumption
description: Assumption about data operations or environment

name: Resource
description: Human or technical resource used in the project

name: OntologySnapshot
description: Snapshot of the ontology or graph at a point in time

name: ProvenanceRecord
description: Record of a change or event affecting the project
